subject: [Radiance-general] Image mapping
body:
On Dec 2, 2004, at 5:35 PM, Gregory J. Ward wrote:

He might, but he's a little lost on both Carsten's and Greg's
suggestions.  This cal file/function stuff has always been a little
dense for me.  I will try to make some sense of this tomorrow, though.
Thanks guys.

=================
Rob Guglielmetti
www.rumblestrip.org
